briefdescription.para: WebSocketClient provides real-time communication with the Sidechain backend.

detaileddescription.para:
Features:
WebSocket RFC 6455 compliant framing (via websocketpp)
Automatic reconnection with exponential backoff
Heartbeat/ping-pong for connection health
Message queueing when disconnected
Thread-safe callbacks on message thread
JWT authentication via query parameter
Usage: webSocket->setAuthToken(token); webSocket->connect(); webSocket->onMessage = [](const juce::var& msg) { ... };
